name: tm15
effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Powerful, but needs
recharging the
next turn.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Powerful, but needs
recharging the
next turn.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A severely damaging
attack that makes
the user rest on
the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is attacked with a powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is thrown using the power of gravity.
It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on
the next turn.
